colorTheme.name: colorTheme
colorTheme.sql: select doc.fullName, doc.title from XWikiDocument as doc, BaseObject as theme where doc.fullName=theme.name and theme.className='ColorThemes.ColorThemeClass' and doc.fullName<>'ColorThemes.ColorThemeTemplate'

guest_comment_requires_captcha.name: guest_comment_requires_captcha
guest_comment_requires_captcha.prettyName: Enable CAPTCHA in Comments for Unregistered Users

colorTheme.name: colorTheme
colorTheme.sql: select doc.fullName, doc.title from XWikiDocument as doc, BaseObject as theme where doc.fullName=theme.name and theme.className='ColorThemes.ColorThemeClass' and doc.fullName<>'ColorThemes.ColorThemeTemplate'

guest_comment_requires_captcha.name: guest_comment_requires_captcha
guest_comment_requires_captcha.prettyName: Enable CAPTCHA in Comments for Unregistered Users

property.confirmation_email_content:
#set ($wikiname = $request.serverName) #set ($host = ${request.getRequestURL()}) #set ($host = ${host.substring(0, ${host.indexOf('/', ${mathtool.add(${host.indexOf('//')}, 2)})})}) Subject: Votre compte utilisateur sur ${wikiname} a été activé
Bonjour ${xwiki.getUserName("$xwikiname", false)},
Votre compte utilisateur sur ${wikiname} a bien été activé. Vous pouvez désormais vous connecter sur ${host}${xwiki.getURL('XWiki.XWikiLogin', 'login')} avec votre nom d'utilisateur : (${xwiki.getDocument($xwikiname).getName()}).

property.meta: <meta name="revisit-after" content="7 days" /> <meta name="description" content="$xwiki.getXMLEncoded($!doc.getRenderedTitle("plain/1.0"))" /> #set($keywords = "wiki,$!doc.getTags()") <meta name="keywords" content="$xwiki.getXMLEncoded($keywords.replaceAll('[|,]', ' ').trim())" /> <meta name="distribution" content="GLOBAL" /> <meta name="rating" content="General" /> <meta name="author" content="$xwiki.getXMLEncoded($!xwiki.getLocalUserName($doc.getAuthor(), false))" /> <meta http-equiv="reply-to" content="" /> <meta name="language" content="$!xcontext.language" /> ## We verify that we don't display RSS feeds on the login page since it causes problems if these feeds are ## protected. In addition it makes the login redirect to the feeds page in some cases. #if($doc.fullName != "XWiki.XWikiLogin") <link rel="alternate" type="application/rss+xml" title="Wiki Feed RSS" href="$xwiki.getURL('Main.WebRss', 'view', 'xpage=rdf')" /> <link rel="alternate" type="application/rss+xml" title="Blog RSS Feed" href="$xwiki.getURL('Blog.GlobalBlogRss', 'view', 'xpage=plain')" /> #end

property.webcopyright: planete.Sankoré is publié sous la licence Creative Commons 2.0
